name: Peach-Thyme Lemonade
description: A thick, rich, and frothy peach-based lemonade lightly scented with thyme. This is the kind of thing you'd want to add a shot of vodka or bourbon to. At least, I'd want to.
recipeIngredient: 3 fresh peaches, pits discarded, flesh roughly chopped
1 cup fresh juice from 10 to 12 lemons
Peach slices and thyme leaves for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine peaches, lemon juice, sugar, and salt in a blender. Blend on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute. Meanwhile, place thyme in bottom of pitcher and lightly muddle with wooden spoon. Strain peach puree through a fine mesh strainer into pitcher. Discard solids. Add cold water and whisk to combine. Add ice. Serve in ice-filled glasses garnished with peach slices and thyme leaves.
